by Cant syndrome ?,Cant syndrome is a rare condition. About three dozen affected individuals have been reported in the medical literature.,GHR,Cant syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Cant syndrome ?,"Cant syndrome results from mutations in the ABCC9 gene. This gene provides instructions for making one part (subunit) of a channel that transports charged potassium atoms (potassium ions) across cell membranes.
